item.title: Lorenz63
item.description: Data Assimilation Experiments with the Lorenz-63 model # Download the pdf Introduction # In Chapter 5, we explored different data assimilation (DA) methods theoretically. This project is intended to give you hands-on experience about their code implementation and get you familiar with different DA methodsâ€™ behaviors. We use the famous 3-variable Lorenz-63 model as our toy numerical weather model for its simplicity and its similar chaotic behaviors as the real NWP models.
